name: Ira, Chaos firstborn
description:
In Ira, Chaos firstborn you will play as Ira, a sympathetic personification of rage in his attempt to escape the order forest, a prison built to keep him away from the world. In fast-paced gameplay, you will have to run before you run out of rage.

This project was solo developed as part of my MA in Indie Game Development at Falmouth University.
